about_the_game:
Monkey Do! is about a mischievous macaque who becomes internet-famous for his Houdini-like zoo escapes. When Mak first breaks out of his tiny cage he finds a phone with, Zooztagram, a social media app that lets him post pictures of his exploits. The more “likes” he gets, the more followers can help him escape (he also learns valuable zoo intel from their posts).

The zookeeper Chesterton tries to thwart Mak’s escape with a combination of cunning traps, robots, and security lackeys. But with the help of his fans, our hero uses disguises and clever ruses to escape, free other animals, and create comical mayhem.

What Makes it Fun?

HIGH ENERGY - The game is full of parodic humor, memorable characters, and acrobatic freedom!



OPEN PLAYGROUND - All of this mischief takes place within a rich simulation and exploration-focused levels.



CHAOTIC SOCIAL NETWORK - It’s called Zooztagram! With it you'll help our hairy hero build fame, influence and literal followers.



This game is still in development so please keep checking back to this page for new features, content, and information!

short_description: Monkey Do! is an action-packed adventure game where you control a mischievous monkey, trying to escape a zoo by all means necessary. On his way out, he will encounter many challenges but also meet cheerful characters to help him in his quest for freedom and fun. Are you ready to monkey?
